    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vicious Fangs](/Feats.aspx?ID=3551) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 59</row>

**Archetype** [Vampire](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=181)

**Prerequisites**
[Vampire Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3545)

</column>

---

You aim for your victim's prominent arteries. Your fangs Strike deals an additional 1d6 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) on a critical hit. At 14th level, the persistent bleed damage increases to 2d6, and at 20th level, the persistent bleed damage increases to 3d6.
